title: 94/85/EC: Commission Decision of 16 February 1994 drawing up a list of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of fresh poultrymeat
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 16 February 1994 drawing up a list of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of fresh poultrymeat (94/85/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Member States shall authorize imports of fresh poultrymeat in accordance with the list in the Annex.
This Decision shall apply from 1 July 1994.
This Decision is addressed to all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 February 1994.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 35.
(2) OJ No L 62, 15. 3. 1993, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 137, 8. 6. 1993, p. 24.
